title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a credit for algae derived fuels, and for other purposes.
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income and excise tax credit for the production of algae derived fuel and fuel mixtures. Defines algae derived fuel as a liquid hydrocarbon product that is derived from the biomass of algal organisms . Terminates such credits after 2012.
